content:
From: Manuel Eberl <eberlm@in.tum.de>
Hallo,

I just noticed that accessing any part of an AFP project on
http://http://afp.sourceforge.net/ gives me a 404, except for the
tarball itself ("Download this entry"). Everything else (e.g. "Proof
outline", "Browse theory") gives me a 404 in all entries that I tested.

What's going on there? Did these things not get built after the release?

Manuel

From: Gerwin Klein <Gerwin.Klein@nicta.com.au>
Iâ€™m in the process of releasing AFP-2016, and something seems to have gone wrong over night. Am looking at it.

Cheers,
Gerwin
